Message:
By the time I ended my
travels and returned home,

I found everything had
long since fallen into ruin.

Ah, no one was persecuted,
or anything of the sort.

Simply put, all the villagers just
died when age caught up to them.

And the village must’ve been
so perfectly hidden away that
not a single new face moved in.

Even when I was traveling
the world seeking compatriots,
I met all sorts of witches.

Many of whom I could
open my heart to...

But in the end,
they all died and
left me behind.

To this day...
this feeling of loneliness
is the one thing I can’t
ever get used to...

Since then, I occupied
the village ruins,
and began my research.

How to wield power,
and how to strengthen it.
How to hide,
and how to fight.

Research done by a witch,
for all witches out there.

If I can’t build
a country for witches,

I thought this research
would at least
make up for it.
I soon learned about you, Duke.
